meta.description: Optimize the production of commodities in Carelland to maximize exports and minimize imports.

sets.name: COMMODITIES
sets.description: Types of commodities produced and exported by Carelland.

params.name: unit_price
params.description: Unit prices of commodities in Klunz.

params.name: import_cost
params.description: Cost of imported goods required for production in Klunz.

params.name: labor_months
params.description: Labor required in person-months per unit of commodity.

params.name: total_labor
params.description: Total available labor force per year in person-months.

params.name: production_requirements
params.description: Units of other commodities required to produce one unit of each commodity.

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of units produced for each commodity.

objective.name: maximize_gdp
objective.expr: sum(production[c] * (unit_price[c] - import_cost[c]) for c in COMMODITIES)
objective.description: Maximize the gross domestic product by optimizing production.

constraints.name: labor_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(production[c] * labor_months[c] for c in COMMODITIES)
constraints.description: Total labor used must not exceed available labor.

constraints.name: production_limit_engines
constraints.description: Production of engines must not exceed its limit.

constraints.name: production_limit_plastics
constraints.description: Production of plastics must not exceed its limit.

constraints.name: steel_requirement_for_engines
constraints.description: Steel required for engines must be available.

constraints.name: electronics_requirement_for_engines
constraints.description: Electronics required for engines must be available.

constraints.name: plastics_requirement_for_engines
constraints.description: Plastics required for engines must be available.

constraints.name: engines_requirement_for_steel
constraints.description: Engines required for steel must be available.

constraints.name: plastics_requirement_for_steel
constraints.description: Plastics required for steel must be available.

constraints.name: steel_requirement_for_electronics
constraints.description: Steel required for electronics must be available.

constraints.name: engines_requirement_for_electronics
constraints.description: Engines required for electronics must be available.

constraints.name: plastics_requirement_for_electronics
constraints.description: Plastics required for electronics must be available.

constraints.name: engines_requirement_for_plastics
constraints.description: Engines required for plastics must be available.

constraints.name: steel_requirement_for_plastics
constraints.description: Steel required for plastics must be available.

constraints.name: electronics_requirement_for_plastics
constraints.description: Electronics required for plastics must be available.
